scenarios.description: Infantry with shield raised, legs exposed - SAFE SHOT (legs only)
Target at head/neck level - DO NOT SHOOT (above arm zone)
Kneeling infantry with shield, legs visible - SAFE SHOT (lob over shield)
Archers back called, target down - DO NOT SHOOT (phase ended)
Enemy below shield line at safe distance - SAFE SHOT
Target area not cleared, no 'archers forward' - DO NOT SHOOT
